title: Add backend command to fetch deployment pods
description: Implement `cluster_get_deployment_pods` command that fetches all pods matching a deployment's selector labels. Should return pod name, namespace, status, age, and ready count.
close_reason: Completed - all functionality implemented in commits 27a6118, 01b06d6, 744dc8d, and cc88994

title: Add backend command to fetch deployment details
description: Implement `cluster_get_deployment_details` Tauri command that fetches full deployment information including metadata, spec, status, labels, annotations, replica counts, strategy, and conditions.
close_reason: Completed - all functionality implemented in commits 27a6118, 01b06d6, 744dc8d, and cc88994

title: Implement Tauri updater with GitHub CI/CD and Pages
description:
Set up the Tauri v2 updater plugin with complete CI/CD infrastructure:
- Enable updater plugin in Rust code
- Configure tauri.conf.json with updater settings
- Create GitHub workflows for PR testing and tag-based releases
- Set up GitHub Pages for update JSON endpoint and download page

title: Implement Helm Integration
description: Implement Helm integration: List Charts from repositories, List Releases, Install/Upgrade/Uninstall charts.

title: Implement Config Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Config resources: ConfigMaps, Secrets, Resource Quotas, Limit Ranges, HPA, PDBs, Priority Classes, Runtime Classes, Leases. Ensure secret values are masked by default.

title: Implement Network Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Network resources: Services, Endpoints, Ingresses, Network Policies, Port Forwarding. Include visual status for services and endpoints.

title: Integrate DeploymentDetailDrawer with WorkloadList
description:
Modify WorkloadList.svelte to:
- Support custom drawer component via prop
- Pass deployment-specific drawer for deployments page
- Fetch and display deployment details when row is clicked
close_reason: Completed - all functionality implemented in commits 27a6118, 01b06d6, 744dc8d, and cc88994

title: Implement OpenLens-style deployment detail drawer
description: Create a comprehensive deployment detail drawer with resource metrics, tabs (CPU, Memory, Network, Filesystem), deployment information, related pods, events, and deploy revisions. This should match the OpenLens UI shown in the user's screenshot.
design:
## Design Overview

The deployment detail drawer will include:

1. **Header**: 
   - Deployment name
   - Action buttons (refresh, edit, delete)
   
2. **Metrics Tabs**: CPU, Memory, Network, Filesystem
   - Time-series chart using Chart.js
   - Real-time metrics streaming

3. **Deployment Details Section**:
   - Created timestamp
   - Name, Namespace
   - Labels (as Badge components)
   - Annotations (expandable/truncated text)
   - Replicas status (desired, updated, total, available, unavailable)
   - Selector
   - Strategy Type (Recreate/RollingUpdate)
   - Conditions (as status badges: Progressing, Available)

4. **Deploy Revisions Section**:
   - Table showing revision history with namespace, pods, age

5. **Pods Section**:
   - Table showing related pods (name, namespace, pods count, age, status)

6. **Events Section**:
   - List of related events with timestamps

## Technical Approach

### Backend (Rust/Tauri):
- Add `cluster_get_deployment_details` command to fetch full deployment info
- Add `cluster_get_deployment_pods` command to list pods by selector
- Add `cluster_get_deployment_events` command to fetch deployment events
- Add `cluster_get_deployment_replicasets` for revision history
- Add metrics streaming support (optional for v1)

### Frontend (Svelte):
- Create `DeploymentDetailDrawer.svelte` component
- Integrate Chart.js for metrics visualization
- Use existing Badge, Drawer, and DataTable components
- Add tab navigation for metrics
acceptance_criteria:
- Deployment detail drawer opens when clicking a deployment row
- All deployment metadata displays correctly (name, namespace, labels, annotations, replicas, strategy, conditions)
- Related pods table shows all pods matching the deployment selector
- Events section shows deployment-related events
- Deploy revisions section shows ReplicaSet history
- Metrics tabs structure is in place (charts can be placeholder initially)
- UI matches OpenLens styling and layout
- All data fetches from backend without errors
close_reason: All subtasks completed - OpenLens-style deployment detail drawer fully implemented

title: Implement App Branding and Logo
description: Create application logo (SVG) and generate app icons for all platforms using `tauri icon`. Update Sidebar to use the new logo.
close_reason: Completed logo creation and icon generation.

title: Fix pnpm configuration for release workflow
description: The release workflow failed with 'packages field missing or empty' because pnpm-workspace.yaml was present but lacked the 'packages' field. This fix moves the configuration to package.json and removes the workspace file.
close_reason: Fixed pnpm configuration by moving it to package.json

title: Implement Access Control Section
description: Implement pages and backend logic for Access Control: Service Accounts, Roles, Cluster Roles, Role Bindings. visualize permissions if possible.

title: Rebrand to Kore
description: Rebrand from RustyLens to Kore (Kubernetes Orchestration and Resource Explorer). Update all branding, color scheme to Kubernetes blue, create new logo (K8s septagon with spyglass), and regenerate all app icons.
